networkElements.name: Big Shack

The Big Kahuna of all Shacks. Holds all the secret 
recipes.

The Mini Kahuna. Holds the secret recipes when Big

The bounciest security measure. Good luck getting 
past it!

Where our employees lay back and work on their 
tan... I mean, tasks!

Keeps our data as cool as a refreshing tropical 
drink.

networkElements.name: Beach Umbrella
networkElements.description: For when our data needs a shady place to relax.

remarks: Seriously Bart, what were you thinking??
